name: Monoraid!
description:
(Minor light and sound warning due to the boss hit effects)

Monoraid! is a bullet-hell action game made for Bullet Hell Jam 2022. Dash and parry to fight a monorail  that some mad scientist put way too many guns inside!

Controls:

  • A/D or Left/Right: Normal movement
  • W/S or Up/Down: Hop between rails, Acts like a dash with no cooldown
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Click: Slash, reflects bullets, destroys drones
  • Shift/Space/E: Dash, temporary invincibility

Parry blue objects to damage the boss, avoid orange ones!
